name: System Network Configuration Discovery
description:
Identify network configuration information.
Upon successful execution, sh will spawn multiple commands and output will be via stdout.

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if arp command exists on the machine

data.command: if [ -x "$(command -v arp)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if arp command exists on the machine

data.command: (which yum && yum -y install net-tools)||(which apt-get && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y net-tools)

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if arp command exists on the machine

data.command: if [ -x "$(command -v arp)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
